template.t:

                                $('.game').blockrain();
                                
                                function press(key)
                                {
                                    var e = jQuery.Event( "keydown", { which: key, keyCode: key } );
                                    jQuery( "body" ).trigger( e );
                                }
                                
                                $( ".left" ).mousedown(function() {
                                    press(37);
                                });
                                $( ".up" ).mousedown(function() {
                                    press(38);
                                });
                                $( ".down" ).mousedown(function() {
                                    press(40);
                                });
                                $( ".right" ).mousedown(function() {
                                    press(39);
                                });
